title: Tristana, where are your boots?
body:
Are you seriously going to go rocket jumping around like that? Also cover your midriff and get rid of that earring, you aren't some punk.

Seriously though, when I think of Tristana, I think of big steel boots made for stomping people, not these tiny feet.  Not to mention she's constantly shooting at her feet with and jumping on top of explosives, I **think** Tristana is smart enough to wear some protection, not whatever.. these are.
http://i.imgur.com/kDEKbfA.png

replies.body:
Couldn't have said it better myself.

George Washington died rocket jumping up stairs, you know.
Yes. Yes she is. She's going to rocket jump straight in to your heart whether you want it or not.
Tristana don't give a damn, she's a strong independent Yordle, who don't need no armour!
EXACTLY.

Like Sejuani? -.-
Why does an elite soldier not wear shoes? Next thing you know we'll have a tank running around in his under- {{champion:79}}....
Next thing you know, fish will sprout legs and-{{champion:105}}....
as believable as a sewer dwelling giant mutated ra-{{champion:29}}
Or a giant in a diving suit starts swimming in the ai- {{champion:111}}
I will believe it when I see champions killed with Smi-{{item:3706}} {{summoner:11}}
I guess Lee sin will never believe then...
Pa dum tsss...
Pfft, I'll believe that when monkeys ta- {{champion:62}}

Meh. I'll believe it when flowers dan- {{champion:143}}
Dammit.

Im going to ruin it. 
I'll believe it when Vel'Koz will have a Spaghetti Monster skin.
Rito pls

But how can IronStylus not want an armored lady D:
Who are you and what have you done to IronStylus!

Not without legs, she isn't!  Unless what you're really saying is that yordles are explosive resistant. Even so, it doesn't feel aesthetically right that she's stomping people with her light weight behind itty bitty feet..

Edit: Also, her boots have always been an integral part of her visual design, not just to fit gameplay.  Her skins fit with the fact she wears boots perfectly, being a firefighter, a commando, a pirate, or a sci-fi space girl.  Removing her boots just doesn't make sense to me when they're such a part of the character, even if people take them for granted.
In all seriousness, why did you decide against boots? Is it a yordle thing?

Question for you IronStylus:

Due to the changes were seeing on Tristana's model, is there going to be a classic splash change again for her?  Seeing as it no longer will resemble her In Game model now.
They will update it.
Yeah I found info on Surrender@20 on that :D

> Consistency is only as important as I want it to be.

Well look at you, and your big artist's pants.

> [{quoted}](name=IronStylus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RclFeNjA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-14T01:42:23.193+0000)
>
> Yes. Yes she is. She's going to rocket jump straight in to your heart whether you want it or not.

Unrelated but... is it just me or is her model's neck a bit too thin... kinda doesn't look right.

Let's be fair here, if you're doing something like rocket jumping, I highly doubt a bit of armour and boots are going to make much difference...


If it's going to seriously hurt you, wearing boots are not going to help that much.


My only complaint is that she's a little too similar to Gnar

> [{quoted}](name=Ginga,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RclFeNjA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-13T23:08:27.638+0000)
>
> Let's be fair here, if you're doing something like rocket jumping, I highly doubt a bit of armour and boots are going to make much difference...
> 
> 
> If it's going to seriously hurt you, wearing boots are not going to help that much.
> 
> 
> My only complaint is that she's a little too similar to Gnar

All yordles come from the same bloodline, they shouldn't have too much of a changed look about each other

All of her skin's models actually have boots, even though I don't think her original model does. A bit odd, but I personally don't care. It does seem odd for a soldier to not wear shoes, but keep in mind they're yordles, and they probably don't wear any shoes normally. (That's what I'd think)
But that isn't even her new splash (She is getting a new one) so we'll have to see what she's wearing on that.
Perhaps Yordles have tough feet like Hobbits?

> [{quoted}](name=Muchashca,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RclFeNjA,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-01-14T19:14:07.874+0000)
>
> Perhaps Yordles have tough feet like Hobbits?

http://i.imgur.com/ay0r3xF.jpg

Ezreal Quote : " Who need armor?" wait wrong quote... 
{{champion:81}} Who need a map?

But i like the fact she wears no boots.
She doesn't give any fucks,she squashes you with or without protection.
On the bright side, now we know how yordle feet can look like (aside from Rumble's Rumble in the Jungle skin).
Screw boots, real champs get {{item:3046}}

TA;DC

Too adorable, don't care.

Yeah I was kind of thinking the same thing, at least if she has the same lore.  I mean, aren't Yordles supposed to be an intelligent, organized, and practical species?

Where is the practicality in what she is wearing?  Corki wears a flight suit, Teemo wears light jungle fatigues, Heimerdinger wears a lab coat, Poppy wears armor, Rumble wears a driving suit, Tristana wears... a gogo clubbing outfit?  If she was just some gun toting punk then it would fit, but she is supposed to be the commando of a special forces unit.  Is the Yordle military completely sexist?  Female recruits have to show some skin to get in the all boys club or something?

Well I guess it would be problematic to launch yourself away with your cannon if you are heavy armored at the same time,since you would obviously weigh a lot more.
Looking at those toes,I'd simply say that yordles have rather sturdy feet and thus going barefoot(or whatever tristana is doing) isn't such a problem,so someone who wants to remain agile wears this,while the heavy armored ones(or the ones who simply dislike this style) use boots.
Or you might want leather and metal to protect you from the heat and kinetic force of the point-blank explosion?

Think of it this way, the commandos are going in the forest at the same frequency as Teemo, except in groups right? In the jungle in Runeterra wearing heavy clothes, and boots are probably not as practical as light clothing that allows air travel. Furthermore, if she is as experienced as before, boots are not needed due to the fact that she is knowledgeable enough of the jungle to have boots be a bigger hazard than help, aka she will have a chance to get stuck on a tree if she has to run.
I support the cry for shiny boots for Tristana! Afterall, the reduce rocket jumping damage by 60%!

When a character's primary means of damage requires SQUASHING the enemy, they might want to wear boots.  Combat boots are fun for squashing.  

I appreciate the effort that went into giving her toes, but it doesn't fit the character.  Neither does her being PURPLE, by the way.

Seriously, would Mario wear those?

> [{quoted}](name=Mistiya,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RclFeNjA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-14T02:19:16.641+0000)
>
> When a character's primary means of damage requires SQUASHING the enemy, they might want to wear boots.  Combat boots are fun for squashing.  
> 
> I appreciate the effort that went into giving her toes, but it doesn't fit the character.  Neither does her being PURPLE, by the way.
> 
> Seriously, would Mario wear those?

Pretty sure Tristana's primary means of damage is shooting the cannon at her enemies...

> [{quoted}](name=Turret49,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RclFeNjA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-13T22:50:38.026+0000)
>
> Are you seriously going to go rocket jumping around like that? Also cover your midriff and get rid of that earring, you aren't some punk.
> 
> Seriously though, when I think of Tristana, I think of big steel boots made for stomping people, not these tiny feet.  Not to mention she's constantly shooting at her feet with and jumping on top of explosives, I **think** Tristana is smart enough to wear some protection, not whatever.. these are.
> http://i.imgur.com/kDEKbfA.png

#I think tristana has cute toes.

U mad?

Seriously

#ALL of her skins have boots.

And I really like the more feral direction they are going with Yordles now. If you love boots so much, go with any of her skins. How about the best one, which is ALSO 

#THE FREE ONE

And she cant wear earrings?

She's a fairly light hearted character, like Lux, not a hardened psychoric killer like teemo. And even teemo could sport an earring.

Ugh.. why do people HAVE to complain about everything Riot does?
I think this design is perfect and I would hate Riot for changing it.

> [{quoted}](name=Orokiyam,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RclFeNjA,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-01-14T09:52:39.238+0000)
>
> Ugh.. why do people HAVE to complain about everything Riot does?
> I think this design is perfect and I would hate Riot for changing it.

Agreed.
i was really hoping someone would bring this up. i would love to see her uniform resemble her current splash with metal gloves and boots and such.

You know... you can just buy boots at Doran's LoL Emporium! 25% off on {{item:3006}}! We'll also add the Homeguard enchantment if you ship straight directly to your base! And guess what, the shipping is free! Head on now to Doran's LoL Emproium!
They have already stated they plan to update the splash art to reflect the new model... They aren't making a NEW splash art, just modifying the existing one.
in before a "wear some protection" joke
